title: World Flags Trivia
description: Challenge your geography skills in World Flags Trivia! Identify the nation for each flag from three choices across 194 questions. Perfect your skills as you progress through increasingly tricky questions. Can you score a perfect game and become a true flag expert? Play now and find out!
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Football Heads 2025
description: Unlock your potential and prove your skills. Outplay your opponents using powerful kicks and unique power-ups. Finally let them know who is the boss with the emotes system - become a football legend today!
instructions: Use the arrow buttons to move and jump across the field. Perform various kicks with the ball buttons. Score more goals in the given time and win the match. Climb divisions and unlock all rewards. Random match powerups and player emotes are available.

title: Paper.io 2
description: Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition. A smooth drawing experience! Use your paper block to steal the area from your online opponents in this game. Capture as much space as possible and try to get the highest score in the lobby. If you move outside your own color, your tail becomes exposed. You will be eliminated when someone manages to catch your tail. So you need to take risks to expand your colored area.
instructions: Use your mouse to move around and cover the map with your color, you can also use the arrow keys on your keyboard or the WASD keys Drag over the other players' white space and paint, then create a connection with your own color to claim that area. When you move outside your color, your tail is exposed to attack. This means that other players can run into you and eliminate you. You'll be constantly battling with other players, whether it's to reclaim your territory or take theirs.

title: Kings and Queens Match 2
description: Kings and Queens Match 2 is one of the most anticipated Match 3 sequels! This long-awaited second chapter features 2,500+ incredible levels full of magic and adventure. Join Princess Bella on a magical adventure, matching jewels and crowns to uncover hidden treasures. Create powerful boosters like Royal Bombs, hammers, and arrows to clear obstacles and win big. Stunning graphics and an enchanting soundtrack bring the kingdom to life. Get ready for a royal journey full of fun and surprises!
instructions: Connect three or more items of the same type to remove them from the board. Every level has a goal that you have to achieve to proceed further. Focus on the goal and plan your moves carefully so that you don’t run out of them before completing the task! Use the Royal Bombs and Hammers to remove blockers and complete daily challenges for even more rewards.

title: Lambo Traffic Racer
description: Lambo Traffic Racing, you will be playing lambo cars through endless highway. It is a great game for kids and adults. Great fun, great graphics and great lambos to drive .
instructions: W, A, S, D/ Arrow Keys: Drive/Steer/Brake , F: Nitro , C: Change Camera

title: Mage's Secret
description: Combine monsters and increase your power by thinking every action. You have to meet monsters, complete more than 100 tasks and learn the secret of the magician.
instructions: The goal of the game is to unravel the main mystery of the magician by completing more than 100 tasks, fighting and uniting various monsters. Players will have to gradually increase their magical power, thinking about every action and effectively managing resources.

title: Agent Squad
description: Looking for an engaging casual shooter that’s easy to get the hang of but offers engrossing action and real tactical challenges? Agent Squad is a top-down shooting game with intelligent mechanics, loads of cool upgradable guns, and addictive gameplay
instructions: The gameplay is very simple, slide the screen or use keyboard to move and defeat all the enemies to successfully enter the next level. More cool guns are waiting for you to unlock! Join now, press the trigger wildly and feel the fun of shooting the game you! Have fun!

title: Dynamons Connect
description: Dive into the exciting world of Dynamons Connect! This fun and engaging game with adorable, colorful characters helps improve focus and visual perception. Match identical tiles by connecting them with a path that has no more than two turns to clear the board. With endless levels, the challenge never stops!
instructions: ✔ Find two matching tiles and connect them with a path that has no more than two 90-degree angles. ✔ Clear the board before time runs out! ✔ Choose between two difficulty modes for the best experience. ✔ Keep playing as long as you want—unlimited levels mean unlimited fun!

title: Kitty Squad Winter Dress Up
description: Step into the adorable world of Kitty Squad Winter Dress Up, where you can style your kitty for the winter season! Choose from cozy outfits, cute accessories, and festive winter gear to create the perfect look for your furry friend. With its charming graphics and endless customization options, this game is perfect for fashion lovers and cat enthusiasts alike. Start dressing up your kitty today!
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click Or Tap to Play

title: Cube Stack 2048
description: Cube Stack 2048 is a highly addictive casual game inspired by the classic puzzle game 2048, but with exciting new gameplay! Merge numbered cubes to double their value, reach 2048, or even higher! Try to make it to the end. Explore tons of amazing and challenging levels by merging cubes, avoiding obstacles, and collecting money!
instructions: Tap or mouse click to play!

title: One HERO
description: One Hero: Dive into the ultimate action-packed shooting game! Play as a lone hero, dodging and shooting your way through waves of enemies. Eliminate all foes to claim victory. Are you ready to be the last one standing? Dive into a thrilling, action-packed adventure where you’ll face waves of enemies and intense boss battles. With intuitive controls and accessible gameplay, players of all skill levels can jump in and start unleashing chaos in no time.
instructions: touchpad and arrow for pc

title: GT Championship Arcade
description: Get ready to ignite your engines and experience the ultimate rush of speed in GT Championship Arcade! This fast-paced, adrenaline-fueled racing game brings the excitement of GT racing into a visually stunning, arcade-style world filled with neon-lit tracks, intense rivalries, and heart-pounding action. Whether you’re a casual gamer looking for quick thrills or a hardcore racing fan seeking the ultimate challenge, this game offers an electrifying experience like no other.
instructions: Arrow key/WASD to move Esc - pause menu

title: Army Fight 3d
description: Begin the nervous army battles in Army Fight 3D. Here you need strategic thinking and quick reflexes.In this fun action battle game, you aim to build a powerful army. Defend your base, and defeat the enemy. Start by creating and upgrading your army.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Battle of Pirate Caribbean Battle
description: Battle of Pirate: Caribbean Battle is an action-packed war game where you command a mighty pirate ship and engage in thrilling naval battles! Prepare for an epic battle war game as you sail through the Caribbean seas, fighting rival pirates, enemy warships, and legendary sea monsters. Use powerful cannons, guns, and strategic combat to conquer the ocean and become the ultimate pirate captain!
instructions: Mouse Control Your JoyStick For Player Ship Movements Keyboard Space Button For Using Fire

title: Stick - Color War
description: To defeat enemies you must shoot bullets of the same color as the enemy. Every five levels you have to defeat a boss. Breaking off new weapons. Will you be able to resist the colored sticks? Play our shooter without downloads and registration.
instructions: Management: On mobile devices: Use the buttons on the phone screen. On PC: Left mouse button - aim and shoot.

title: Survival Sword Battle
description: Survival Sword Battle throws you into a ruthless sword-fighting free-for-all battle where a single hit means defeat. Fight to unlock all 10 character evolutions and boost your speed with each upgrade. Can you dominate the leaderboard and survive the longest?
instructions: * Move the mouse to guide your character * Click left mouse button to Attack * Hold right mouse button to Speed Boost

title: Drawing Squares
description: Drawing Squares is the logic game that will blow your mind! It is a logic game inspired by the classic pen and paper game Dots and Boxes. Do you remember the game you used to play at school? (also known as Boxes, Squares, Paddocks, Pigs in a Pen, Square-it, Dots and Dashes, Dots, Smart Dots, Dot Boxing, or, simply, the Dot Game).
instructions: The point of the game is, to complete a square on the graph paper on your classmate behalf. To do this you must draw a line where your classmate WILL NOT take advantage of your move and complete a square. The game ends when no more lines can be placed. The winner is the one who scores the most points.

title: Weaponsmith Evolution - Weapon Merge
description: - Start with basic weapons and drag identical ones to merge them into more powerful versions. - Each new weapon brings more gold. - Spend gold on upgrades: unlock new types of weapons or speed up the merging process. - Fight monsters and progress through levels. - From time to time, you’ll encounter powerful bosses. Defeat them to prove your mastery!
instructions: - Start with basic weapons and drag identical ones to merge them into more powerful versions. - Each new weapon brings more gold. - Spend gold on upgrades: unlock new types of weapons or speed up the merging process. - Fight monsters and progress through levels. - From time to time, you’ll encounter powerful bosses. Defeat them to prove your mastery!

title: Obby 3D Sprunki Parkour
description: Obby 3D Sprunki Parkour combines the best elements of obstacle challenges and parkour gameplay in an immersive 3D environment. The goal? Navigate through increasingly complex levels filled with moving platforms, tricky jumps, and narrow ledges while collecting coins and power-ups along the way. Each level offers unique challenges that test your timing, reflexes, and problem-solving skills.
instructions: How to Play Start Playing: Open your browser and visit your favorite gaming platform. Search for "Obby 3D Sprunki Parkour" to launch the game instantly. Controls: Use the arrow keys or WASD to move, jump, and navigate. Precision and timing are key to mastering each level. Collect Coins: Grab coins scattered across the level for extra points and special rewards. Avoid Obstacles: Jump over gaps, dodge moving platforms, and stay on track to reach the finish line.

title: Astral Escape
description: Play Astral Escape online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Strawberry BoardGames
description: Visit the BerryWorks cafeteria and play checkers, memory, tic-tac-toe, connecting pairs, and complete jigsaw puzzles with your friends.
instructions: The game is controlled with the computer mouse or with a finger on mobile devices

title: Bubble Shooter Remastered
description: Shoot groups of bubbles and form groups to make them pop. Form groups of 3 or more bubbles of the same color to make the bubbles explode.
instructions: If you just want to relax a bit and like shooting balls, then why not start with the classics. Ball shooting games help relieve stress after a hard day's work, distract from worries and calmly enjoy a pleasant game.

title: Ellie and Friends Venice Carnival
description: Step into the glamorous world of Venice Carnival Dressup with Ellie and Friends Venice Carnival, where you can join Ellie and her friends at one of the most extravagant events of the year. The Venice Carnival is all about stunning masks, luxurious costumes, and endless glamour, and now you get to help Ellie and her friends get ready for the big celebration! Design unique looks and create the perfect carnival style with a variety of costumes, accessories, and masks.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Frogtastic Marble Adventure
description: Get ready to dive into a world of colors and adrenaline with Frogtastic, the puzzle game that will keep you glued to the screen! Jump into the adventure and save your world from the invasion of colorful spheres by combining strategy and lightning-fast reflexes! Endless fun! Whether you have a few minutes for a quick game or want to dive into long gaming sessions, Frogtastic is perfect for you. Play now and experience a puzzle game you won’t forget!
instructions: Shoot colorful spheres and form groups of at least three spheres of the same color to make them explode. Be quick: the spheres move along an increasingly winding path, and you can't let them reach the final destination! Can you stop all the spheres before it's too late?

title: Royal Jewels Match
description: Matching jewels has never been so much fun! Unlock unique levels, participate in special events and take on surprising challenges. Collect coins with your matches and show off your decorating skills. Earn crowns as you progress and become a true master of the game!
instructions: The goal of the game is to match three or more jewels of the same type to complete levels and earn coins. Use your coins to purchase unique decorations, and for every purchase, you'll earn crowns that help you unlock the next exciting adventure!

title: Motorcycle Racer: Road Mayhem
description: Motorcycle Racer: Road Mayhem is an exciting motorcycle racing game. In this game you will become a motorcycle racer who travels through city streets and highways, avoiding collisions with other vehicles. You will be able to unlock faster and more powerful motorcycles, each with its own unique handling characteristics, as well as improve the characteristics of your motorcycle. One of the key features of the game is a realistic physics engine that makes the gameplay challenging and exciting.
instructions: The goal of the game is to upgrade and buy motorcycles, participate in races and win at all levels. Control on a mobile device: touch. PC control: arrows for traffic

title: Fight to the end
description: Play Fight to the end online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Oil Tanker Transport Truck
description: Let's go on to ride with an oil tanker transporter truck across all the continents like the Euro, Asia, and America oil transporter truck game has real features in the Euro and American cargo systems of the fuel truck.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: Merge Racer Stunts Car
description: Welcome to Merge Racer - Stunts Car! This is an exciting and creative racing game. You show your driving skills and use the power of merge to build supercars! Merge the same types of cars to create stronger racing machines. Each merge improves your car’s performance, helping you speed ahead of your rivals.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mushroom Fever Match 3
description: Immerse yourself in the magical forest with Mushroom Fever - Match 3! Bright and cheerful mushrooms replace traditional crystals, adding a fresh twist to the classic match-3 genre. This game will bring you hours of thrilling fun and bursts of excitement! Match groups of three or more mushrooms, complete engaging tasks, and unlock new levels! Each level brings unique puzzles and fresh challenges. The more matches you make, the more points and bonuses you’ll earn!
instructions: 1. Collect Mushrooms: Your goal is to gather as many groups of three or more matching mushrooms as possible. Swap them around to create rows or columns of identical mushrooms. 2. Complete Tasks: Each level has unique objectives, such as collecting a specific number of mushrooms or reaching a target score within a limited number of moves. 3 .Use Bonuses and Boosters: The game features special power-ups to help you progress faster.

title: Doge Bubble
description: Doge Bubble is a classic bubble shooter game with multiple challenging levels. Doge Bubbles features the classic bubble shooter gameplay with 3 powerups: The rocket that clears the chosen path, the bomb that clears up to 8 bubbles at a time and the multi color bubble. The goal in each level is to "free" all the doge bubbles.
instructions: Swipe to aim and shoot the bubbles! Match three or more bubbles to remove them from the board. Clear all doge bubbles and use boosters to help you in challenging levels.

title: Mahjong Pet Quest
description: Dive into the colorful and engaging world of Mahjong Pet Quest, a fun and relaxing puzzle game where classic Mahjong meets adorable animal tiles! Replace the classic Mahjong tiles with cute animal-themed ones! Each tile brings a charming, delightful touch to the game. Explore a variety of levels, each designed to test your skills and logic. The difficulty increases as you progress, ensuring that you’re always challenged!
instructions: Match pairs of animal tiles to clear the board. You can only match tiles that are free and have no other tiles blocking them! Clear all the tiles to complete the level and move on to the next.

title: Submarine Attack
description: Command a submarine, destroy enemy ships with torpedoes, unlock new weapons, and conquer the ocean. Engage in thrilling naval battles, use unique abilities, face numerous enemies, and wield powerful armaments to achieve victory.
instructions: Mobile: Hold your finger and drag in different directions to aim at the enemy. Press the red button to attack. PC (mouse): Hold the mouse button and drag in different directions to aim at the enemy. Press the red button to attack. PC(keyboard): Use w,a,s,d or arrows to aim and space to shoot. Use shift to speed up the camera.

title: Zombie Chase
description: In Zombie Chase, players navigate a chaotic world filled with the undead, using every ounce of strategic prowess to outlast the apocalypse. This is not a typical racing game, youll need to manage resources and make smart decisions to survive the relentless zombie hordes. Your brain isnt just a desirable snack for zombies in this game - its your greatest weapon!
instructions: Using your mouse or touchscreen controls, steer your character through the grid-based game world, avoiding zombies and collecting resources as you go. You can also set traps for zombies, but be careful not to get cornered yourself. Progress in the game re

title: Kitty Couple Lovely Valentine
description: Celebrate love with the adorable kitty duo Angela and Tom in Kitty Couple Lovely Valentine. This charming game takes players on a delightful journey filled with fashion, hidden surprises, and puzzles. Help the cute couple prepare for their special Valentine’s Day by dressing them up, uncovering hidden hearts, and completing their couple photo puzzle.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click

title: Heritage Mahjong Classic
description: Immerse yourself in a timeless Mahjong experience with Heritage Mahjong Classic. Featuring a single elegant layout, three unique tile skins, a time bonus for quick matches, and a competitive leaderboard, this game offers a simple yet captivating challenge. Perfect for players of all levels, enjoy a relaxing atmosphere as you match tiles, earn bonuses, and climb the ranks. Are you ready to test your skills and embrace the charm of classic Mahjong? Start your journey today!
instructions: Find and match identical tiles to remove them from the board. Ensure tiles are free on at least one side before matching. Clear all tiles to complete the layout and test your skills! Use the Hint feature to guide you through tricky situations. Enjoy a relaxing Mahjong experience with timeless gameplay, beautiful tile designs, and a competitive leaderboard!

title: Mega Lamba Ramp
description: Crazy car stunts and stunt car racing games that will give you the most thrilling experience. Perform dangerous stunts on impossible tracks in our racing and stunt simulator. Perform stunts on all the cars for your favorite characters to move to the next level!
instructions: To complete the level, you need to get into the car with your character and do tricks on all the cars. Controls: WASD and arrows - move the car and the character, R - flip the car, Shift - accelerate the character and nitro when driving a car Space - handbrake Phone controls: move the steering wheel with your finger left and right to turn. Press the forward and backward buttons to accelerate and brake.

title: FNF 2 Player
description: FNF 2 Player allows two players to play at the same time. Players can compete with each other by choosing the characters they want. The difficulty level can be determined by the music, thus appealing to all types of players. Game Modes: - Story Mode: You fight with new characters weekly. - Freeplay Mode: You can play by choosing the song you want. - 2 Player Mode: It's time to duel with your friend.
instructions: Controls: The first player uses the "ARROW KEYS", while the second player uses the "W, A, S, D" keys. Game Purpose: To defeat your opponent by pressing the arrows that appear on the screen at the right time. While correct moves increase your score, mistakes cause a loss of points. You should hold down the button according to the length of the arrow for long arrows.

title: Broken City Combat
description: Immerse yourself in the chaotic battleground of Broken City Combat, a fast-paced FPS set in a desolate urban warzone. As the city crumbles under relentless attacks, you are tasked with surviving the brutal onslaught while rescuing survivors and taking down ruthless enemies. Navigate through abandoned streets, derelict buildings, and multi-floor complexes, each filled with challenges and surprises.
instructions: - Left Mouse to Shot - Right Mouse button for Scope - E to Pick UP - 1,2,3,4,5 to change weapon

title: Ragdoll Bounce
description: Jump into a fun 2D challenge where you control a ragdoll launched by a bigger ragdoll. Click to bounce on platforms and keep climbing. But be careful—missing a platform means a big fall!
instructions: Control a ragdoll in a 2D jumping game, bouncing on platforms to stay in the air.

title: Space Blast
description: Space Blast is a 2D game full of action arcade game where your piloting skills and strategic thinking are key to navigating relentless waves of meteors. Command a powerful spaceship equipped with advanced weapons and take on the challenge of protecting the galaxy from incoming threats.
instructions: Shoot the planets and upgrade your weapon

title: Last Standing
description: Players are dropped onto a map and start without weapons. The map is scattered with a wealth of weapons and equipment. Players need to constantly explore and collect these resources to enhance their survival ability and combat power. The core goal of the game is to be the last survivor. Usually, there are multiple players in each game, and they are randomly distributed on the map.
instructions: As the game progresses, the safe zone will gradually shrink, forcing players to gather towards the central area, increasing the chances of encounters. Players need to search for weapons and other items that can improve their survival ability. The game also tests players' strategic planning and psychological quality. virtual joystick or WASD keyboard

title: Merge Car Defense
description: Prepare to battle wave upon wave of relentless enemies as you skilfully merge and upgrade the defences of your cars. Build out a roster of cars and use them tactically in order to defeat the enemy, collect coins and be victorious!
instructions: Use your mouse to swipe to upgrade the cars

title: Imposter 3D
description: Brace yourself for a thrilling challenge! Tap the screen to release balls and guide them into the holes each round. Afterward, head to the store to snag upgrades and cool items to power up your game. Complete levels, gather diamonds, and unlock permanent upgrades to boost your progress. How far can you take your skills? The further you go, the greater the rewards!
instructions: Desktop: - move around the level with the mouse. Mobile: - move around the level with the joystick. Controls (general): - to kill an enemy, just get close to him; - if you are a "Hero", avoid the enemy's line of sight (red cone); - if you are a "Killer", save your partner from the cage (to do this, go into the cage).

title: Feed the Parrot
description: Hello! In this exciting game you will have to help the cute parrot to fill up on delicious fruit. Combine identical fruit tiles to clear the playing field and open new levels, compete with other players, enjoy the bright pixel art and comfortable puzzle difficulty level. Each game session offers unique challenges and colorful backgrounds, creating an atmosphere of fun and relaxation - the game is perfect for relaxing after a long day at work.
instructions: Collect three tiles with the same fruit in a glass, keep the glass full - this way you will get more points. If the glass is completely filled with tiles, you lose.

title: Sponge Challenge
description: In Sponge Challenge, you command a bouncy, yellow sponge through a captivating 2D puzzle platform adventure. Your mission is to guide the flexible sponge in collecting precious purple diamonds while maneuvering through levels packed with obstacles and devious traps. Each stage presents a unique puzzle that requires you to leverage the sponges sticky abilities to climb walls, jump between surfaces, and discover the perfect path to the magical portal that leads to subsequent levels.
instructions: Sponge Challenge employs simple yet engaging controls. Tap the screen to make your sponge jump. Utilize walls and platforms strategically to alter your direction mid-air, allowing you to navigate through each level’s obstacles and traps effectively.

title: Boolu Bask
description: Dunk Ball game is an exciting sports-based game that brings the thrills of basketball right to your device. The focus of the game is on scoring points by aiming each ball into the moving basket. Show off your agility, precision, and timing as you handle each ball with finesse and drop them into the basket for maximum points.
instructions: To play Dunk Ball, simply move your basket left or right to catch the ball as it descends from above. It requires sharp reflexes and strategy to ensure each ball falls perfectly into the basket. As you progress, the game's tempo increases, demanding more skill, attention, and faster reactions for scoring.

title: Bank Robbery 3
description: It is time for a new robbery! Your new target is the most secure bank in the city. According to the inside data, the bank is equipped with the newest automated anti-robbery technologies, which makes this robbery a tough one. But it shouldn’t be much of a problem for a professional like you. And as always, if you succeed, a big payday awaits you. Come on, let’s do it!
instructions: WASD = move Left-click = shoot Right-click = iron sight Mouse wheel / 1-7 = change weapons Left-shift = run C = crouch E = interact

title: Racing Pinball
description: Play Racing Pinball online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Sweetsu Tile Puzzle
description: Sweet Tile Puzzle is a relaxing yet strategic game. Match 3 identical Japanese-themed tiles by drawing them into a limited stack. Clear the board by collecting all tiles while managing space wisely. With each level, challenges grow as the stack shrinks and more tiles appear. Can you master the art of tile matching?
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.
